summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Intertech QA Task Management application. Backend APIs working at 92.9% success rate, frontend UI fully functional with all core features working correctly.

minor_bugs.issue: MongoDB ObjectId serialization error in create endpoints
minor_bugs.impact: Was blocking task and project creation
minor_bugs.status: Fixed by excluding _id field from responses

ui_bugs.issue: Invalid email error message not displayed on UI
ui_bugs.details: Backend validation works correctly, but UI doesn't show error toast

ui_bugs.issue: Toast notification overlay blocks mobile menu interaction
ui_bugs.details: Success toast appears and blocks mobile menu button click

console_warnings.issue: React duplicate key warnings for 'custom-test' category
console_warnings.impact: Console warnings but no functional impact
console_warnings.details: Duplicate categories being rendered, likely from multiple test runs

passed_tests: All CRUD operations for tasks and projects
action_item_for_main_agent: Minor UI improvements needed: 1) Add error toast display for invalid email validation on login form, 2) Fix toast overlay z-index issue blocking mobile menu, 3) Clean up duplicate category keys in React rendering
